attributes.action: something to  be done on water pricing  at service stations, Airports, etc.
attributes.background: In the past I've had countless encountering with over priced water at service stations, railways, airports, city centres etc. Prices that exceed over 2 pounds for a 500ml bottle of water and sugar drinks actually being lower in cost. This discourage people to take on necessary daily fluids intake.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
